description: Observations to City of London for demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment by: erection of a 45 storey building comprising: Class B1 office; Class A retail at ground level; mezzanine and basement and; Sky room at 40th level (including mezzanine and roof terrace) to be used for uses within Class D1 (non-residential institution) and including  as a venue for receptions, promotions, product launches, private dining and similar functions. Erection of a 3 storey building for Class A3 (restaurant and cafe) and A4 (drinking establishment) uses, and Class B1 (offices) and associated servicing facilities, including vehicle and cycle lifts to basement; Construction of 2 level of basement and underground parking, servicing, facilities associated with the sky room and ancillary plant; Provision of a new pedestrian route and publicly accessible open area; landscaping and provision of new vehicular access arrangements and reconfiguration of existing servicing arrangements for adjoining properties and other associated works. (98, 288sqm). This application is accompanied by an environmental statement.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE:  This Council considers the height and form of the proposal to be overpowering, inappropriately detached from the cluster of developing high buildings in the City and harmful to the setting of buildings along the river. This Council also notes that no views of the proposal have been provided from the north including from the Archway.
ward:
Within City (near Bunhill Ward)
Within City (near Clerkenwell Ward)
